{"id":1235378473,"question_id":520,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713409469,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1235378473/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"41.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean detectCapitalUse(String word) {\n        int countCapital = 0;\n        for (char c : word.toCharArray()) {\n            if (Character.isUpperCase(c)) {\n                countCapital++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // All letters are capitals or all are lowercase\n        if (countCapital == word.length() || countCapital == 0) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // Only the first letter is capital\n        return countCapital == 1 && Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(0));\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
